name: Scavanger
description:
Scavanger is a game where you collect food and try to run from enemies.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move. Every Action consumes food. Moving onto a food tile will give you a food boost. Walls can be destroyed by moving into them 4 times.

Enemies will attack you every other turn. You need to avoid them or they will steal your valueable food.

Get to the exit to win.
